name: tab-application-switcher
description: Switch between browser tabs like you switch between applications

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:firefox && npm run build:edge && npm run build:safari
scripts.zip:all: npm run zip && npm run zip:firefox && npm run zip:edge && npm run zip:safari
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run zip && wxt submit --chrome-zip ".output/tab-application-switcher-$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")-chrome.zip"
scripts.lint: npm run tc && npm run lint:eslint
